title: Sidewall, "East India", 1940–50
creditline: Gift of Katzenbach and Warren, Inc.
description: Arabesque design of foliage and flowers, in the manner of Jean Pillement's Indian designs. Major flower and leaf elements are large in scale. a) browns and blues on cream ground; b) pinks, browns, greens and yellows, on dark brown; c): greens and yellows on gray; d) greens, pinks and blues on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, "East India", 1940–50.
1940–50. Machine-printed. Gift of Katzenbach and Warren, Inc.. 1953-192-3-a/d.
